net.tridentsdk.server.threads

Class PlayerThreads

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.threads.PlayerThreads

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class PlayerThreads
extends java.lang.Object
    Player handling thread manager, 4 threads by default

    • Method Detail

      • clientThreadHandle

        public static TaskExecutor clientThreadHandle(Player player)
        Gets the management tool for the player

        This will put in a new value for the caches if cannot find for a new player

        May block the first call

        Parameters:
        player - the player to find the wrapper for
        Returns:
        the execution tool for the player

      • remove

        public static void remove(ClientConnection connection)
        Decaches the player connection handler from the mappings
        Parameters:
        connection - the player to remove the wrapper cache

      • wrappedPlayers

        public static java.util.Collection<Player> wrappedPlayers()
        Gets all of the thread player wrappers
        Returns:
